程序包 vue

类 GameInterface

java.lang.Object
vue.GameInterface
所有已实现的接口:
java.util.Observer
public class GameInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
A class of Vue which offers game interface for users and communicates with Controller ControleurGame
从以下版本开始:
13 January 2021
版本:
%I%
作者:
WU Zhongyang, GUAN Mingjun
另请参阅:
GameInterface, Game

    构造器 说明
    GameInterface​(Game g)
    This is the constructor of the class GameInterface.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    javax.swing.JFrame getMainFrame()
    This method gets the attribute frmShapeUp
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    Function Main for initializing everything needed, including new object of Game, ConsoleVue, GameInterface, and the cycle of the game.
    void setCardImage​(javax.swing.ImageIcon i, javax.swing.JLabel jl)
    This method sets up the image of the JLabel
    void update​(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
    This method is used for update the images of cards and hints showed in the interface graphic when this observer is notified by the Observable Game.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameInterface

      public GameInterface​(Game g)
      This is the constructor of the class GameInterface. starts the initialization of frames, layouts , buttons , labels, etc. adding this class to the observer list of the Observable Game also create an object of ControleurGame and forms the MVC.
      参数:
      g - The object of the class Game.

  • 方法详细资料

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Function Main for initializing everything needed, including new object of Game, ConsoleVue, GameInterface, and the cycle of the game. Launch the application.
      参数:
      args - any arguments

    • update

      public void update​(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object arg)
      This method is used for update the images of cards and hints showed in the interface graphic when this observer is notified by the Observable Game.
      指定者:
      update 在接口中 java.util.Observer
      参数:
      o - the observable object.
      arg - an argument passed to the notifyObservers

    • getMainFrame

      public javax.swing.JFrame getMainFrame()
      This method gets the attribute frmShapeUp
      返回:
      frmShapeUp type JFrame, the main frame of the interface graphic.

    • setCardImage

      public void setCardImage​(javax.swing.ImageIcon i, javax.swing.JLabel jl)
      This method sets up the image of the JLabel
      参数:
      i - type ImageIcon leads to the file of the image.
      jl - type JLabel which is the label whose image needs to be changed
